column1: Little Goat Diner////I really wanted to love this place since we loved our Girl & the Goat experience. The crab dip was nothing special which was a bummer. My husband got the fried chicken and I got the pork cemitas sandwich. Both entrees were perfectly cooked
column2: but both lacked some serious flavor. Our waitress talked up the seasonings on the pork and none of them came through. We will not return.
